website_summaries.verdict: This mid- to upper-range model  offers the tonality and action comparable to higher-end instruments.
pros: Recommended for soloists and ensemble members
Professional key styling, impressive mechanical action
Comes in a variety of finishes
cons: You may wish to replace the standard mouthpiece and neck strap

customer_reviews.title: TWO YEAR LOVE AFFAIR-SO I BOUGHT ANOTHER
customer_reviews.text: A high item on an old dudes bucket list. Couldn't be happier. Actually slept one night with it in my bed after some of my blues licks started sounding like Lou Donaldson. I am using Rico Select jazz reeds. Can definitely hold its own on a professional performance level. Mine came out of the box with a normal brass appearance but has gradually darkened to a very subdued Black appearance. Looks, feel and sound are all excellent.
customer_reviews.author: electroman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves loves loves this saxophone. Her music teacher was so impressed with it he was a bit jealous and looked it up and now wants one of his own. She said it was much easier to hit the high and low notes then her previous model. I was worried about her switching models but with this one she didn't have any problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Lenay

customer_reviews.title: This is a solid instrument with good range. It has good internal intonation and enables ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid instrument with good range. It has good internal intonation and enables an easy reach to the bottom of the horn. The switch from upper to lower register has a bit of a wild tone but that can be controlled by the player. Intonation is good up high.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Demas

customer_reviews.title: Beautifull and fantastic saxophone with great tone
customer_reviews.text: Beautifull and fantastic saxophone with great tone....not fan of the strap that comes with it ( I purchased another brand later) ....also it dosent come with swab for cleaning inside it so make sure u buy that before hand ....but the case is great and professional for carrying it.....the sax itself is great ....have fun with this beauty. The price is unbelievable for this sax. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Faraz

customer_reviews.title: Great saxophone for high school student!
customer_reviews.text: My son has been using this saxophone for over a year now in his high school band and absolutely loves it. It was a great upgrade for him over the very old one he had been using. Overall, we have been very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Garrett

customer_reviews.title: From one of the most important manufacters in the world.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and an astonishing finishing as well as the packing.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Carneiro

customer_reviews.title: Completely impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely an impressive instrument. Selmer is a top tier brand for saxophones and other woodwinds and delivers with the La Voix II. Great sound, well crafted, good looking, and comfortable fingering. Far above the student line and this instrument could easily outperform the vast majority of other brand's professional models. Completely pleased with this sax and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: SamB2

customer_reviews.title: Selmer is a company that keeps their word.
customer_reviews.text: The selmer SAS280 La Voix is a good saxophone great step -up for beginners to intermediate level of play. When I received my sax it was damaged broken G# key . I contacted the seller and Selmer and within 4-5 days received another new saxophone. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and warm sound - Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful saxophone with a rich and warm sound. Super happy about this buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL instrument. Plays beautifully
customer_reviews.text: WONDERFUL instrument. Plays beautifully. I haven’t picked up a sax in over 18 years and it was just like yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER WOLFE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect saxophone. I recommend
customer_reviews.text: It's a perfect saxophone!!! It's not like new, it's a new one. The sound, the look everything's PERFECT!!!!!!! My son is proud of his saxophone!THANK YOU VERY MUCH!!!
customer_reviews.author: Spys

customer_reviews.title: Great instrument
customer_reviews.text: Bought this saxophone for my son's birthday. There was a delay due to stock however, Instrument Pro did everything possible for me to receive the saxophone as soon as possible. My son loves the saxophone. Awesome instrument, great packaging, in Great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelming
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to own this sax due to great reviews. It was a let down once I was able to play it more. It sounds flatter and has a thinned or weak output compared to my less known rental sax.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: just like new
customer_reviews.text: This saxo was just like a new . Exactly as is was described by the seller. No scratches, no signs of use at all. A wery good saxo with the entire additionals like cage, mouthpiece, wax, etc. I was totally satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: victor duerksen

customer_reviews.title: I doubt there's a better horn in this price range (unless you go used)
customer_reviews.text: I doubt there's a better horn in this price range (unless you go used). Super responsive keys, good looking, and the case is handy too.
customer_reviews.author: James McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: beautiful. wonderful sound quality. Very good packing. Reeds, neck belt, cleaning cloth all come along with the instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Xueping Li

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sax. Good tuning throughout and nice round sound.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Gsons gifted....
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my Gson and he absolutely loves his saxophone! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I have ever made. This sax is sexy and sounds great. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tone - disappointed
customer_reviews.text: While I will say this sax has nice tone and good action from the keys. I was disappointed that it was made in Taiwan. I was replacing an older Selmer USA sax that was made in the USA. It is a very nice alto but for 2300.00 dollars I really thought it was made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal and beautiful saxophone
customer_reviews.text: Thanks Amazon!! Awesome deal and beautiful saxophone! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sax
customer_reviews.text: The sax arrived quickly and well packaged. This is my first sax and I started taking lessons immediately. I am very pleased so far. I had no experience with a saxophone until now so I can't compare it with anything. However, I pray it will continue to please me for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: lenora Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I have been playing on this sax for about 3 months now and it’s just beautiful. It is definitely a looker and needs to ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m a freshman in high school who has been playing the alto for about 4 years now. I have been playing on this sax for about 3 months now and it’s just beautiful. It is definitely a looker and needs to be treated with much care. The sound it has is amazing and with the right person the tone can be just excellent on it. The only thing I would recommend is getting a different mouthpiece for it. The one on it isn’t horrible but I myself do prefer a bit more higher end mouth piece.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Sounds unlike any other
customer_reviews.text: Sounds unlike any other student grade sax, deep and soulful, perfect for jazz
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Shopper

product_meta.title: Selmer SAS280 La Voix II Alto Saxophone Outfit Copper Body with Yellow Brass Bell and Keys
product_meta.description: Color:Copper Body with Yellow Brass Bell and KSAS280 La Voix II Alto Saxophone Outfit Copper Body with Yellow Brass Bell and Keys. The Selmer SAS280 La Voix II Alto Saxophone's fluid keywork gives it a relaxed feeling, while its perfect intonation and warm sound make it a welcome instrument both in the concert band or the hands of a soloist. The Selmer La Voix II sax' traditional-sized bell helps saxophonists keep their tone focused and makes blending easy. You'll like the price of the Selmer SAS280 La Voix alto saxophone as much as its sound. Finally you can afford a step-up sax with features like professional key styling-for accurate fingering-that you would expect to find only on more expensive instruments. Selmer has worked to make the SAS280 La Voix II an alto sax that is easy to play. Pitch is consistent without strain from the low end to altissimo. The La Voix II saxophone can really project and offers you dark jazzy sound when you need it. The Selmer SAS280 La Voix II Alto Saxophone is a player's instrument made affordable for all musicians.
feature_bullets: SAS280 La Voix II Alto Saxophone Outfit Copper Body with Yellow Brass Bell and Keys

The Selmer SAS280 La Voix II Alto Saxophone's fluid keywork gives it a relaxed feeling, while its perfect intonation and warm sound make it a welcome instrument both in the concert band or the hands of a soloist
The Selmer La Voix II sax' traditional-sized bell helps saxophonists keep their tone focused and makes blending easy
You'll like the price of the Selmer SAS280 La Voix alto saxophone as much as its sound
Finally you can afford a step-up sax with features like professional key styling-for accurate fingering-that you would expect to find only on more expensive instruments
